Localization.Title: Hail, and well met!
Localization.Text:
The Lord of the Rings Living Card Game is a narrative adventure game in which you form your own fellowships of Heroes to stand against Sauron, the source of evil that threatens all of Middle-earth during the Third Age.
     In this game, Sauron is an active opponent. He directs the actions of his forces and plays his own hand of cards against your Heroes. He influences everything you encounter, from Enemies you face to Objectives needed to complete each Quest.
     This tutorial guides you through the basics of gameplay. First, let's look at the game environmentâ€¦
